entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
